articles.description: Paco Rabanne, best known for his perfumes and fashion designs, dies at his home in France.
articles.content:
Celebrated perfume and fashion designer Paco Rabanne has died aged 88 at his home in France. 
His death was confirmed by Puig, the parent company of his brands, which said he had "marked generations… [+3564 chars]

articles.title: Losing Oldham Coliseum a dreadful blow, town's residents say - BBC
articles.description: Oldham's residents react to the town's only professional theatre losing its Arts Council funding.
articles.content:
The loss of Oldham Coliseum, which cancelled all its upcoming shows after its funding was cut, is a "dreadful blow", the town's residents have said.
